00103         template<class H, class T>
00104         struct policy_cons
00105         {
00106                 typedef H head;
00107                 typedef T tail;
00108 
00109                 template<class U>
00110                 policy_cons<U, policy_cons<H,T> > operator,(policy_cons<U,detail::null_type>)
00111                 {
00112                         return policy_cons<U, policy_cons<H,T> >();
00113                 }
00114 
00115                 template<class U>
00116                 policy_cons<U, policy_cons<H,T> > operator+(policy_cons<U,detail::null_type>)
00117                 {
00118                         return policy_cons<U, policy_cons<H,T> >();
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 template<class U>
00122                 policy_cons<U, policy_cons<H,T> > operator|(policy_cons<U,detail::null_type>)
00123                 {
00124                         return policy_cons<U, policy_cons<H,T> >();
00125                 }
00126         };

00164     namespace mpl = boost::mpl;
00165 
00166     template <class T, class Clone>
00167     void make_pointee_instance(lua_State* L, T& x, mpl::true_, Clone)
00168     {
00169         if (get_pointer(x))
00170         {
00171             make_instance(L, x);
00172         }
00173         else
00174         {
00175             lua_pushnil(L);
00176         }
00177     }
00178 
00179     template <class T>
00180     void make_pointee_instance(lua_State* L, T& x, mpl::false_, mpl::true_)
00181     {
00182         std::auto_ptr<T> ptr(new T(x));
00183         make_instance(L, ptr);
00184     }
00185 
00186     template <class T>
00187     void make_pointee_instance(lua_State* L, T& x, mpl::false_, mpl::false_)
00188     {
00189         make_instance(L, &x);
00190     }
00191 
00192     template <class T, class Clone>
00193     void make_pointee_instance(lua_State* L, T& x, Clone)
00194     {
00195         make_pointee_instance(L, x, has_get_pointer<T>(), Clone());
00196     }

00198 // ********** pointer converter ***********
00199 
00200         struct pointer_converter
00201         {
00202                 typedef pointer_converter type;
00203         typedef mpl::false_ is_native;
00204 
00205         pointer_converter()
00206           : result(0)
00207         {}
00208 
00209         void* result;
00210 
00211         int const consumed_args(...)
00212         {
00213             return 1;
00214         }
00215 
00216                 template<class T>
00217                 void apply(lua_State* L, T* ptr)
00218                 {
00219                         if (ptr == 0) 
00220                         {
00221                                 lua_pushnil(L);
00222                                 return;
00223                         }
00224 
00225                         if (luabind::get_back_reference(L, ptr))
00226                                 return;
00227 
00228             make_instance(L, ptr);
00229                 }
00230 
00231                 template<class T>
00232                 T* apply(lua_State*, by_pointer<T>, int)
00233                 {
00234             return static_cast<T*>(result);
00235                 }
00236 
00237                 template<class T>
00238                 int match(lua_State* L, by_pointer<T>, int index)
00239                 {
00240                         if (lua_isnil(L, index)) return 0;
00241                         object_rep* obj = get_instance(L, index);
00242                         if (obj == 0) return -1;
00243 
00244             if (obj->is_const())
00245                 return -1;
00246 
00247             std::pair<void*, int> s = obj->get_instance(registered_class<T>::id);
00248             result = s.first;
00249             return s.second;
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 template<class T>
00253                 void converter_postcall(lua_State*, by_pointer<T>, int) 
00254                 {}
00255         };
00256 
00257 // ******* value converter *******
00258 
00259         struct value_converter
00260         {
00261                 typedef value_converter type;
00262         typedef mpl::false_ is_native;
00263 
00264         int const consumed_args(...)
00265         {
00266             return 1;
00267         }
00268 
00269         value_converter()
00270           : result(0)
00271         {}
00272 
00273         void* result;
00274 
00275                 template<class T>
00276                 void apply(lua_State* L, T x)
00277                 {
00278                         if (luabind::get_back_reference(L, x))
00279                                 return;
00280 
00281             make_pointee_instance(L, x, mpl::true_());
00282                 }
00283 
00284                 template<class T>
00285                 T apply(lua_State*, by_value<T>, int)
00286                 {
00287             return *static_cast<T*>(result);
00288                 }
00289 
00290                 template<class T>
00291                 int match(lua_State* L, by_value<T>, int index)
00292                 {
00293                         // special case if we get nil in, try to match the holder type
00294                         if (lua_isnil(L, index))
00295                                 return -1;
00296 
00297                         object_rep* obj = get_instance(L, index);
00298                         if (obj == 0) return -1;
00299 
00300             std::pair<void*, int> s = obj->get_instance(registered_class<T>::id);
00301             result = s.first;
00302             return s.second;
00303                 }
00304 
00305                 template<class T>
00306                 void converter_postcall(lua_State*, T, int) {}
00307         };
00308 
00309 // ******* const pointer converter *******
00310 
00311     struct const_pointer_converter
00312         {
00313                 typedef const_pointer_converter type;
00314         typedef mpl::false_ is_native;
00315 
00316         int const consumed_args(...)
00317         {
00318             return 1;
00319         }
00320 
00321         const_pointer_converter()
00322           : result(0)
00323         {}
00324 
00325         void* result;
00326 
00327                 template<class T>
00328                 void apply(lua_State* L, const T* ptr)
00329                 {
00330                         if (ptr == 0) 
00331                         {
00332                                 lua_pushnil(L);
00333                                 return;
00334                         }
00335 
00336                         if (luabind::get_back_reference(L, ptr))
00337                                 return;
00338 
00339             make_instance(L, ptr);
00340                 }
00341 
00342                 template<class T>
00343                 T const* apply(lua_State*, by_const_pointer<T>, int)
00344                 {
00345                         return static_cast<T const*>(result);
00346                 }
00347 
00348                 template<class T>
00349                 int match(lua_State* L, by_const_pointer<T>, int index)
00350                 {
00351                         if (lua_isnil(L, index)) return 0;
00352                         object_rep* obj = get_instance(L, index);
00353                         if (obj == 0) return -1; // if the type is not one of our own registered types, classify it as a non-match
00354             std::pair<void*, int> s = obj->get_instance(registered_class<T>::id);
00355             if (s.second >= 0 && !obj->is_const())
00356                 s.second += 10;
00357             result = s.first;
00358             return s.second;
00359                 }
00360 
00361         template<class T>
00362         void converter_postcall(lua_State*, T, int) {}
00363         };
00364 
00365 // ******* reference converter *******
00366 
00367     struct ref_converter : pointer_converter
00368         {
00369                 typedef ref_converter type;
00370         typedef mpl::false_ is_native;
00371 
00372         int const consumed_args(...)
00373         {
00374             return 1;
00375         }
00376 
00377                 template<class T>
00378                 void apply(lua_State* L, T& ref)
00379                 {
00380                         if (luabind::get_back_reference(L, ref))
00381                                 return;
00382 
00383             make_pointee_instance(L, ref, mpl::false_());
00384                 }
00385 
00386                 template<class T>
00387                 T& apply(lua_State* L, by_reference<T>, int index)
00388                 {
00389                         assert(!lua_isnil(L, index));
00390             return *pointer_converter::apply(L, by_pointer<T>(), index);
00391                 }
00392 
00393                 template<class T>
00394                 int match(lua_State* L, by_reference<T>, int index)
00395                 {
00396             object_rep* obj = get_instance(L, index);
00397             if (obj == 0) return -1;
00398 
00399             if (obj->is_const())
00400                 return -1;
00401 
00402             std::pair<void*, int> s = obj->get_instance(registered_class<T>::id);
00403             result = s.first;
00404             return s.second;
00405                 }
00406 
00407                 template<class T>
00408                 void converter_postcall(lua_State*, T, int) {}
00409         };
00410 
00411 // ******** const reference converter *********
00412 
00413         struct const_ref_converter
00414         {
00415                 typedef const_ref_converter type;
00416         typedef mpl::false_ is_native;
00417 
00418         int const consumed_args(...)
00419         {
00420             return 1;
00421         }
00422 
00423         const_ref_converter()
00424           : result(0)
00425         {}
00426 
00427         void* result;
00428 
00429                 template<class T>
00430                 void apply(lua_State* L, T const& ref)
00431                 {
00432                         if (luabind::get_back_reference(L, ref))
00433                                 return;
00434 
00435             make_pointee_instance(L, ref, mpl::false_());
00436                 }
00437 
00438                 template<class T>
00439                 T const& apply(lua_State*, by_const_reference<T>, int)
00440                 {
00441                         return *static_cast<T*>(result);
00442                 }
00443 
00444                 template<class T>
00445                 int match(lua_State* L, by_const_reference<T>, int index)
00446                 {
00447                         object_rep* obj = get_instance(L, index);
00448                         if (obj == 0) return -1; // if the type is not one of our own registered types, classify it as a non-match
00449 
00450             std::pair<void*, int> s = obj->get_instance(registered_class<T>::id);
00451             if (s.second >= 0 && !obj->is_const())
00452                 s.second += 10;
00453             result = s.first;
00454             return s.second;
00455                 }
00456 
00457                 template<class T>
00458                 void converter_postcall(lua_State*, by_const_reference<T>, int)
00459                 {
00460                 }
00461         };

00463         // ****** enum converter ********
00464 
00465         struct enum_converter
00466         {
00467                 typedef enum_converter type;
00468         typedef mpl::true_ is_native;
00469 
00470         int const consumed_args(...)
00471         {
00472             return 1;
00473         }
00474                 
00475                 void apply(lua_State* L, int val)
00476                 {
00477                         lua_pushnumber(L, val);
00478                 }
00479 
00480                 template<class T>
00481                 T apply(lua_State* L, by_value<T>, int index)
00482                 {
00483                         return static_cast<T>(static_cast<int>(lua_tonumber(L, index)));
00484                 }
00485                 
00486                 template<class T>
00487                 static int match(lua_State* L, by_value<T>, int index)
00488                 {
00489                         if (lua_isnumber(L, index)) return 0; else return -1;
00490                 }
00491 
00492                 template<class T>
00493                 T apply(lua_State* L, by_const_reference<T>, int index)
00494                 {
00495                         return static_cast<T>(static_cast<int>(lua_tonumber(L, index)));
00496                 }
00497 
00498                 template<class T>
00499                 static int match(lua_State* L, by_const_reference<T>, int index)
00500                 {
00501                         if (lua_isnumber(L, index)) return 0; else return -1;
00502                 }
00503 
00504                 template<class T>
00505                 void converter_postcall(lua_State*, T, int) {}
00506         };
00507 
00508         template <class U>
00509         struct value_wrapper_converter
00510         {
00511                 typedef value_wrapper_converter<U> type;
00512                 typedef mpl::true_ is_native;
00513 
00514         int const consumed_args(...)
00515         {
00516             return 1;
00517         }
00518 
00519                 template<class T>
00520                 T apply(lua_State* L, by_const_reference<T>, int index)
00521                 {
00522                         return T(from_stack(L, index));
00523                 }
00524 
00525                 template<class T>
00526                 T apply(lua_State* L, by_value<T>, int index)
00527                 {
00528                         return apply(L, by_const_reference<T>(), index);
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 template<class T>
00532                 static int match(lua_State* L, by_const_reference<T>, int index)
00533                 {
00534                         return value_wrapper_traits<T>::check(L, index) 
00535                 ? (std::numeric_limits<int>::max)() / LUABIND_MAX_ARITY
00536                 : -1;
00537                 }
00538 
00539                 template<class T>
00540                 static int match(lua_State* L, by_value<T>, int index)
00541                 {
00542                         return match(L, by_const_reference<T>(), index);
00543                 }
00544 
00545                 void converter_postcall(...) {}
00546 
00547                 template<class T>
00548                 void apply(lua_State* interpreter, T const& value_wrapper)
00549                 {
00550                         value_wrapper_traits<T>::unwrap(interpreter, value_wrapper);
00551                 }
00552     };
00553 
00554     template <class T>
00555     struct default_converter_generator
00556       : mpl::eval_if<
00557             is_value_wrapper_arg<T>
00558           , value_wrapper_converter<T>
00559           , mpl::eval_if<
00560                 boost::is_enum<typename boost::remove_reference<T>::type>
00561               , enum_converter
00562               , mpl::eval_if<
00563                     is_nonconst_pointer<T>
00564                   , pointer_converter
00565                   , mpl::eval_if<
00566                         is_const_pointer<T>
00567                       , const_pointer_converter
00568                       , mpl::eval_if<
00569                             is_nonconst_reference<T>
00570                           , ref_converter
00571                           , mpl::eval_if<
00572                                 is_const_reference<T>
00573                               , const_ref_converter
00574                               , value_converter
00575                             >
00576                         >
00577                     >
00578                 >
00579             >
00580         >
00581     {};
00582 
00583 } // namespace detail

00585 // *********** default_policy *****************
00586 
00587 template <class T>
00588 struct default_converter
00589   : detail::default_converter_generator<T>::type
00590 {};
00591 
00592 template <class T, class Derived = default_converter<T> >
00593 struct native_converter_base
00594 {
00595     typedef boost::mpl::true_ is_native;
00596 
00597     int const consumed_args(...)
00598     {
00599         return 1;
00600     }
00601 
00602     template <class U>
00603     void converter_postcall(lua_State*, U const&, int)
00604     {}
00605 
00606     int match(lua_State* L, detail::by_value<T>, int index)
00607     {
00608         return derived().compute_score(L, index);
00609     }
00610 
00611     int match(lua_State* L, detail::by_value<T const>, int index)
00612     {
00613         return derived().compute_score(L, index);
00614     }
00615 
00616     int match(lua_State* L, detail::by_const_reference<T>, int index)
00617     {
00618         return derived().compute_score(L, index);
00619     }
00620 
00621     T apply(lua_State* L, detail::by_value<T>, int index)
00622     {
00623         return derived().from(L, index);
00624     }
00625 
00626     T apply(lua_State* L, detail::by_value<T const>, int index)
00627     {
00628         return derived().from(L, index);
00629     }
00630 
00631     T apply(lua_State* L, detail::by_const_reference<T>, int index)
00632     {
00633         return derived().from(L, index);
00634     }
00635 
00636     void apply(lua_State* L, T const& value)
00637     {
00638         derived().to(L, value);
00639     }
00640 
00641     Derived& derived()
00642     {
00643         return static_cast<Derived&>(*this);
00644     }
00645 };
00646 
00647 template <class T>
00648 lua_Integer as_lua_integer(T v)
00649 {
00650     return static_cast<lua_Integer>(v);
00651 }
00652 
00653 template <class T>
00654 lua_Number as_lua_number(T v)
00655 {
00656     return static_cast<lua_Number>(v);
00657 }
00658 
00659 # define LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(type, kind) \
00660     template <> \
00661 struct default_converter<type> \
00662   : native_converter_base<type> \
00663 { \
00664     int compute_score(lua_State* L, int index) \
00665     { \
00666         return lua_type(L, index) == LUA_TNUMBER ? 0 : -1; \
00667     }; \
00668     \
00669     type from(lua_State* L, int index) \
00670     { \
00671         return static_cast<type>(BOOST_PP_CAT(lua_to, kind)(L, index)); \
00672     } \
00673     \
00674     void to(lua_State* L, type const& value) \
00675     { \
00676         BOOST_PP_CAT(lua_push, kind)(L, BOOST_PP_CAT(as_lua_, kind)(value)); \
00677     } \
00678 }; \
00679 \
00680 template <> \
00681 struct default_converter<type const> \
00682   : default_converter<type> \
00683 {}; \
00684 \
00685 template <> \
00686 struct default_converter<type const&> \
00687   : default_converter<type> \
00688 {};
00689 
00690 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(char, integer)
00691 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(signed char, integer)
00692 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(unsigned char, integer)
00693 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(signed short, integer)
00694 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(unsigned short, integer)
00695 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(signed int, integer)
00696 
00697 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(unsigned int, number)
00698 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(unsigned long, number)
00699 
00700 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(signed long, integer)
00701 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(float, number)
00702 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(double, number)
00703 LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER(long double, number)
00704 
00705 # undef LUABIND_NUMBER_CONVERTER
00706 
00707 template <>
00708 struct default_converter<bool>
00709   : native_converter_base<bool>
00710 {
00711     static int compute_score(lua_State* L, int index)
00712     {
00713         return lua_type(L, index) == LUA_TBOOLEAN ? 0 : -1;
00714     }
00715 
00716     bool from(lua_State* L, int index)
00717     {
00718         return lua_toboolean(L, index) == 1;
00719     }
00720 
00721     void to(lua_State* L, bool value)
00722     {
00723         lua_pushboolean(L, value);
00724     }
00725 };
00726 
00727 template <>
00728 struct default_converter<bool const>
00729   : default_converter<bool>
00730 {};
00731 
00732 template <>
00733 struct default_converter<bool const&>
00734   : default_converter<bool>
00735 {};
00736 
00737 template <>
00738 struct default_converter<std::string>
00739   : native_converter_base<std::string>
00740 {
00741     static int compute_score(lua_State* L, int index)
00742     {
00743         return lua_type(L, index) == LUA_TSTRING ? 0 : -1;
00744     }
00745 
00746     std::string from(lua_State* L, int index)
00747     {
00748         return std::string(lua_tostring(L, index), lua_strlen(L, index));
00749     }
00750 
00751     void to(lua_State* L, std::string const& value)
00752     {
00753         lua_pushlstring(L, value.data(), value.size());
00754     }
00755 };
00756 
00757 template <>
00758 struct default_converter<std::string const>
00759   : default_converter<std::string>
00760 {};
00761 
00762 template <>
00763 struct default_converter<std::string const&>
00764   : default_converter<std::string>
00765 {};
00766 
00767 template <>
00768 struct default_converter<char const*>
00769 {
00770     typedef boost::mpl::true_ is_native;
00771 
00772     int const consumed_args(...)
00773     {
00774         return 1;
00775     }
00776 
00777     template <class U>
00778     static int match(lua_State* L, U, int index)
00779     {
00780         int type = lua_type(L, index);
00781         return (type == LUA_TSTRING || type == LUA_TNIL) ? 0 : -1;
00782     }
00783 
00784     template <class U>
00785     char const* apply(lua_State* L, U, int index)
00786     {
00787         return lua_tostring(L, index);
00788     }
00789 
00790     void apply(lua_State* L, char const* str)
00791     {
00792         lua_pushstring(L, str);
00793     }
00794 
00795     template <class U>
00796     void converter_postcall(lua_State*, U, int)
00797     {}
00798 };
00799 
00800 template <>
00801 struct default_converter<const char* const>
00802   : default_converter<char const*>
00803 {};
00804 
00805 template <>
00806 struct default_converter<char*>
00807   : default_converter<char const*>
00808 {};
00809 
00810 template <std::size_t N>
00811 struct default_converter<char const[N]>
00812   : default_converter<char const*>
00813 {};
00814 
00815 template <std::size_t N>
00816 struct default_converter<char[N]>
00817   : default_converter<char const*>
00818 {};
00819 
00820 template <>
00821 struct default_converter<lua_State*>
00822 {
00823     int const consumed_args(...)
00824     {
00825         return 0;
00826     }
00827 
00828     template <class U>
00829     lua_State* apply(lua_State* L, U, int)
00830     {
00831         return L;
00832     }
00833 
00834     template <class U>
00835     static int match(lua_State*, U, int)
00836     {
00837         return 0;
00838     }
00839 
00840     template <class U>
00841     void converter_postcall(lua_State*, U, int) {}
00842 };
00843 
00844 namespace detail
00845 {
00846 
00847         struct default_policy : converter_policy_tag
00848         {
00849                 BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, has_arg = true);
00850 
00851                 template<class T>
00852                 static void precall(lua_State*, T, int) {}
00853 
00854                 template<class T, class Direction>
00855                 struct apply
00856                 {
00857             typedef default_converter<T> type;
00858         };
00859         };
00860 
00861     template<class T>
00862     struct is_primitive
00863       : default_converter<T>::is_native
00864     {};
00865 
00866 // ============== new policy system =================
00867 
00868         template<int, class> struct find_conversion_policy;
00869 
00870         template<bool IsConverter = false>
00871         struct find_conversion_impl
00872         {
00873                 template<int N, class Policies>
00874                 struct apply
00875                 {
00876                         typedef typename find_conversion_policy<N, typename Policies::tail>::type type;
00877                 };
00878         };
00879 
00880         template<>
00881         struct find_conversion_impl<true>
00882         {
00883                 template<int N, class Policies>
00884                 struct apply
00885                 {
00886                         typedef typename Policies::head head;
00887                         typedef typename Policies::tail tail;
00888 
00889                         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, found = (N == head::index));
00890 
00891                         typedef typename
00892                                 boost::mpl::if_c<found
00893                                         , head
00894                                         , typename find_conversion_policy<N, tail>::type
00895                                 >::type type;
00896                 };
00897         };
00898 
00899         template<class Policies>
00900         struct find_conversion_impl2
00901         {
00902                 template<int N>
00903                 struct apply
00904                         : find_conversion_impl<
00905                                 boost::is_base_and_derived<conversion_policy_base, typename Policies::head>::value
00906                         >::template apply<N, Policies>
00907                 {
00908                 };
00909         };
00910 
00911         template<>
00912         struct find_conversion_impl2<detail::null_type>
00913         {
00914                 template<int N>
00915                 struct apply
00916                 {
00917                         typedef default_policy type;
00918                 };
00919         };
00920 
00921         template<int N, class Policies>
00922         struct find_conversion_policy : find_conversion_impl2<Policies>::template apply<N>
00923         {
00924         };
00925 
00926         template<class List>
00927         struct policy_list_postcall
00928         {
00929                 typedef typename List::head head;
00930                 typedef typename List::tail tail;
00931 
00932                 static void apply(lua_State* L, const index_map& i)
00933                 {
00934                         head::postcall(L, i);
00935                         policy_list_postcall<tail>::apply(L, i);
00936                 }
00937         };
00938 
00939         template<>
00940         struct policy_list_postcall<detail::null_type>
00941         {
00942                 static void apply(lua_State*, const index_map&) {}
00943         };
00944 
00945 // ==================================================
00946 
00947 // ************** precall and postcall on policy_cons *********************
00948 
00949 
00950         template<class List>
00951         struct policy_precall
00952         {
00953                 typedef typename List::head head;
00954                 typedef typename List::tail tail;
00955 
00956                 static void apply(lua_State* L, int index)
00957                 {
00958                         head::precall(L, index);
00959                         policy_precall<tail>::apply(L, index);
00960                 }
00961         };
00962 
00963         template<>
00964         struct policy_precall<detail::null_type>
00965         {
00966                 static void apply(lua_State*, int) {}
00967         };
00968 
00969         template<class List>
00970         struct policy_postcall
00971         {
00972                 typedef typename List::head head;
00973                 typedef typename List::tail tail;
00974 
00975                 static void apply(lua_State* L, int index)
00976                 {
00977                         head::postcall(L, index);
00978                         policy_postcall<tail>::apply(L, index);
00979                 }
00980         };
00981 
00982         template<>
00983         struct policy_postcall<detail::null_type>
00984         {
00985                 static void apply(lua_State*, int) {}
00986         };
00987 
00988 }} // namespace luabind::detail
00989 
00990 
00991 namespace luabind { namespace
00992 {
00993 #if defined(__GNUC__) && ( \
00994     (BOOST_VERSION < 103500) \
00995  || (BOOST_VERSION < 103900 && (__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__ <= 400)) \
00996  || (__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__ < 400))
00997   static inline boost::arg<0> return_value()
00998   {
00999           return boost::arg<0>();
01000   }
01001 
01002   static inline boost::arg<0> result()
01003   {
01004           return boost::arg<0>();
01005   }
01006 # define LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(N) boost::arg<N>(*)()
01007 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC) || defined(__MWERKS__) \
01008   || (BOOST_VERSION >= 103900 && defined(__GNUC__) \
01009         && (__GNUC__ * 100 + __GNUC_MINOR__ == 400))
01010   static boost::arg<0> return_value;
01011   static boost::arg<0> result;
01012 # define LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(N) boost::arg<N>
01013 #else
01014   boost::arg<0> return_value;
01015   boost::arg<0> result;
01016 # define LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(N) boost::arg<N>
01017 #endif
01018 }}
